name: Scrap Mechanic
description: Welcome to the machine-filled creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic, a multiplayer sandbox game with imagination and ingenuity at its core. Create fantastic machines, transforming vehicles or sneaky traps. The possibilities are endless with Scrap Mechanics powerful tools.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista (SP1) Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 220 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 (latest SP) or later Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.8 GHz (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
